sentence.Network_en: There was an unappealing film of slime on top of the pond.
sentence.Network_cn: 池塘表面有一层黏腻腻的污泥。

sentence.Network_en: He's wearing a deeply unappealing baseball hat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他戴着一顶很不起眼的棒球帽。

sentence.Network_en: The town is scruffy and unappealing.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个城镇脏乱不堪，令人生厌。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... unappealable 不可上诉的 unappealing 无吸引力的 unappeasable 不能满足的.
希高翻译-心理学词汇中英对照二十四 ... unappalled 不屈不挠的 unappealing 不吸引人的 unappeasable 不能和解的.
每日练习:公共英语... ... on welfare 接受社会救济 16.unappealing adj. 无吸引力的, 不能打动人的 17.justice n 公平;合理;公正.
... 7.harmless adj. 无害的;不致伤的 8.unappealing adj. 不吸引人的; 乏味的 1.rare adj. 罕见的, 珍贵的,很少发生的,少见的.

list.abs: what is your most unappealing habit ?什么是你最讨厌的习惯？
the prospect of studying for another five years was distinctly unappealing .未来还需要再学五年真是让人厌烦。

other failings bring about Web sites that are visually mundane or unappealing , but-when they are actually read-strongly encourage visitors give their business the company .其它缺点可能导致网站缺少视觉吸引力，但网站内容会鼓励访问者购买公司产品。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as unappealing, you find them unpleasant and unattractive.

example.ex: He's wearing a deeply unappealing baseball hat...
example.tran: 他戴着一顶很不起眼的棒球帽。

example.ex: The town is scruffy and unappealing.
example.tran: 那个城镇脏乱不堪，令人生厌。

means.word_mean: 1. (of characters in literature or drama) tending to evoke antipathetic feelings;
2. not able to attract favorable attention;

sentences.sentence: "they have made the place as unappealing as possible"
"was forced to talk to his singularly unappealing hostess"

auth_sentence.content: Opening his lips to disclose an unappealing collection of gunmetal fillings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opening his lips to disclose an unappealing collection of gunmetal fillings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opening his lips to disclose an unappealing collection of gunmetal fillings.

auth_sentence.content: He finds the gym boring and basketball and baseball leagues unappealing.
auth_sentence.res_content: He finds the gym boring and basketball and baseball leagues unappealing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He finds the gym boring and basketball and baseball leagues unappealing.

auth_sentence.content: Wall Street looks unappealing by the numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wall Street looks unappealing by the numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wall Street looks unappealing by the numbers.
